trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown to communicate errors to the client when the client connects to non-.NET Framework applications that cannot throw exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端连接到无法引发异常的非 .NET Framework 应用程序时，则引发该异常，以向客户端传达错误。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_SERVER, which has the value 0x8013150E.
<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> 使用默认<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支持引用相等性的实现。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>，请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认属性初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> inherits from the <xref:System.SystemException> class.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class:
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>类：

trans-unit.source: Property
Value
The empty string ("")
The message that describes the exception
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> class with a specified message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> inherits from the <xref:System.SystemException> class.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class:
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>类：

trans-unit.source: Property Type
Condition
The `message` string
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
If the <c>InnerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>InnerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException> class:
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ServerException>类：

trans-unit.source: Property
Value
The inner exception reference
The error message string
